db:abstract.db:para: The QtHelp module provides classes for integrating online documentation in applications.

db:section.db:title: Getting Started
db:section.db:para: To link against the Qt Help module, add this line to the project file:

db:section.db:title: Articles and Guides
db:section.db:para: The classes and tools supplied with Qt to enable developers to include online help and documentation in their applications are described in more detail in The Qt Help Framework.
